title: Lentil salad with roasted garlic and tomatoes
ingredients: ['2 bulbs garlic', '1 teaspoon olive oil, divided', '450g uncooked brown lentils', '1 litre water, or as needed to cover', '300g cherry tomatoes, halved', '1 bunch fresh parsley, finely chopped', '1 bunch spring onions, thinly sliced', '60ml balsamic vinegar', '60ml olive oil', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
